metadata.description:
hello again friends !

"Through the Haze" is the next installment in my series of experimental B-sides.  

in between major projects, i find myself working on tracks that i describe as "brain cleanse" sessions.  these tracks tend to function as a creative oil change and help flush out whatever previous project i was working on.  they also help with exploring new avenues of sound design and songwriting.  

this particular project was created entirely on my modular synthesizer system.  a few years back, i was approached by a company that sold music for movie/tv trailers, and they wanted a piece of music from me.  i had absolutely no clue how to write that type of music, so i ended up just jamming on my modular system and wound up with the fun, mysterious journey you hear today.

i also just got off of an extensive tour, so you can expect to hear more from me in the coming months.  thanks for listening, hope yall enjoy <3
metadata.name: Through the Haze #1
metadata.title: Through the Haze
